feed.title: Rallly Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Rallly: v3.5.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

This update improves compatibility with OAuth providers that return non-standard OIDC fields. It also contains bug fixes and improvements under the hood as well as updated translations.

New Contributors

  • @avm99963 made their first contribution in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/969

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/compare/v3.4.2...v3.5.0

entry.title: New release for Rallly: v3.5.1
entry.content:
What's Changed?

Added a fallback to the given_name field when parsing profiles from identity providers.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/compare/v3.5.0...v3.5.1

entry.title: New release for Rallly: v3.6.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

Fixed an issue that caused redirect to login to fail when accessing the polls page.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/compare/v3.6.0...v3.6.1

entry.title: New release for Rallly: v3.7.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • ‚ú® Use only geographic time zones by @lukevella in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1033
  • üêõ Fix timezone form input by @lukevella in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1043
  • ‚ö°Ô∏è Quicker UI updates when adding participant by @lukevella in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1045
  • üêõ Fix check for missing token on initial render by @lukevella in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1054
  • üêõ Fix issue where verification links would automatically get consumed by link checkers by @lukevella in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1060

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/compare/v3.6.1...v3.7.0
